abstract: Goldman Sachs Capital Partners has emerged as the lead bidder after a competitive auction process held by Apple American’s current owner, Weston Presidio Capital.
snippet: Goldman Sachs Capital Partners has emerged as the lead bidder after a competitive auction process held by Apple American’s current owner, Weston Presidio Capital.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs‘s private equity unit is nearing a deal to buy Apple American Group, the biggest franchisee of Applebee’s Neighborhood Grill and Bar, a person briefed on the matter said Friday.

headline.main: Goldman’s Buyout Unit Nears Deal for Applebee’s Operator

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
